root.name: Steins;Gate: Senkei Kousoku no Phenogram
root.description: Steins;Gate: Linear Bounded Phenogram is a science fiction visual novel, intended as a spin-off to the original Steins;Gate, as part of the Steins;Gate series and Science Adventure franchise.It is being developed by 5pb. and will be written by scenario writers Naotaka Hayashi, the writer of the Steins;Gate and Science Adventure series, in collaboration with Kotaro Uchikoshi, best known for the Infinity and Zero Escape series.Rather than being told from the perspective of protagonist Rintaro Okabe, Linear Bounded Phenogram will be told from the perspective of each of his lab members.ScenariosInformation on two of the game's various scenarios have been made available:Eternal PolarisMayuri Shiina feels that something has been off with Okabe Rintaro and Makise Kurisu, lately. After seeing the worried expression on their faces, she begins to think that it had something to do with herself. Mayuri builds the courage to confront Kurisu about the problem. Hesitant at first, Kurisu decides to talk.Quantum Excited in ComaMoeka Kiryu works as a Rounder for SERN. She was ordered by her boss, FB, to create a futuristic gadget and monitor the laboratory. When they discovered the microwave theyâ€™ve been researching can also be used as a time-manipulating device, FB ordered them to destroy it and to dismantle the team of researchers.
